qr-generator.question: Is this QR Code Generator free?
qr-generator.answer: Yes, our Advanced QR Code Generator is 100% free to use for both personal and commercial purposes. There are no hidden fees or subscription limits.

qr-generator.question: Do the QR codes expire?
qr-generator.answer: No, the Static QR codes generated on our platform never expire. They will work forever as long as the information you encoded (like the URL) remains valid.

qr-generator.question: Can I customize the QR code with my logo?
qr-generator.answer: Absolutely! You can upload your own logo, change the colors, add gradients, and customize the corner shapes to match your brand identity.

qr-generator.question: Is my data private?
qr-generator.answer: Yes, we prioritize your privacy. The QR code generation happens client-side in your browser, meaning your data is not sent to or stored on our servers.

qr-generator.question: What formats can I download?
qr-generator.answer: You can download your high-quality QR codes in PNG, JPEG, and SVG vector formats, suitable for both digital use and high-resolution printing.

temp-mail.question: What is Temp Mail?
temp-mail.answer: Temp mail is a disposable email service that provides a quick, temporary inbox to protect your privacy and avoid spam in your primary inbox.

temp-mail.question: Is OD2 Temp Mail free?
temp-mail.answer: Yes, our temporary email service is 100% free to use with no registration required.

temp-mail.question: How long do emails last?
temp-mail.answer: All emails received are automatically deleted 12 hours after being received to ensure your privacy and security. You can also manually delete them instantly.

passport-photo-printing.question: What is the correct passport photo size for India?
passport-photo-printing.answer: The standard passport photo size for India is 51x51 mm (600x600 px) with a white background.

passport-photo-printing.question: How many photos fit on a 6x4 sheet?
passport-photo-printing.answer: Our tool automatically generates a 6x4 printable sheet with cut lines, fitting the maximum number of photos allowed by your selected country's dimensions.

passport-photo-printing.question: Is registration required to use the Passport Photo Maker?
passport-photo-printing.answer: No, the OD2 Passport Photo Maker is 100% free to use and requires no registration or account creation.

url-encoder-decoder.question: What characters are encoded in a URL?
url-encoder-decoder.answer: Special characters like spaces, &, ?, and = are replaced with percent-encoded equivalents (e.g., %20 for a space) to ensure they are handled correctly by web servers.

url-encoder-decoder.question: Can I decode a URL multiple times?
url-encoder-decoder.answer: Yes, you can use our 'Use as Input' feature to chain multiple encoding or decoding operations for complex URLs.

url-encoder-decoder.question: Is this URL tool free for commercial use?
url-encoder-decoder.answer: Yes, all tools provided by One Day Developers (OD2) are 100% free for both personal and professional use.

convert-image-to-blob.question: Why should I convert an image to a Data URL (Blob)?
convert-image-to-blob.answer: Converting images to Data URLs reduces HTTP requests, improves offline support, and allows for embedding images directly into CSS or email templates.

convert-image-to-blob.question: Is my data secure when using this converter?
convert-image-to-blob.answer: Yes, all conversions happen locally in your browser. Your images are never uploaded to our servers, ensuring total privacy.

convert-image-to-blob.question: Which file formats are supported?
convert-image-to-blob.answer: Our converter supports all common image formats including JPG, PNG, GIF, and SVG.

test-mail.question: Can I send test emails directly with this tool?
test-mail.answer: Currently, you can use our production-ready templates for manual testing. Direct email sending via SMTP/API is coming soon as a free service.

test-mail.question: Are these email templates mobile-responsive?
test-mail.answer: Yes, all our templates are designed and tested to be fully responsive across modern email clients like Gmail, Outlook, and Apple Mail.

test-mail.question: Do you provide templates for verification codes (OTP)?
test-mail.answer: Yes, we provide specific templates for OTP, Transactional receipts, Newsletters, and Marketing emails.

blog.question: How can I submit a guest post?
blog.answer: We welcome guest contributions! Please check our Blog Submission Guidelines to understand our requirements and submission process.

blog.question: What topics do you cover?
blog.answer: We cover a wide range of technical topics including Web Development, AI & Machine Learning, Mobile App Development, Cloud Computing, and Software Engineering best practices.

blog.question: How often is the blog updated?
blog.answer: We aim to publish new insightful articles and tutorials every week. Subscribe to our newsletter or follow us on social media to get notified about the latest posts.

blog.question: Can I request a tutorial on a specific topic?
blog.answer: Absolutely! We love hearing from our community. Feel free to contact us or send a message on our social media channels with your topic suggestions.
